quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Fonz and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, fonz, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What year did the TV series The Love Boat  first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1977

questions.question: In the animated series The Flintstones, Fred and Barney were members of  what lodge organization?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Order of Water Buffaloes

questions.question: What was The Fonz most prized possession on the face of the Earth in Happy Days?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His motorcycle

questions.question: In one episode of Happy Days, The Fonz jumped over something while water skiing. That episode led to a popular term for a show that has began its decline or hit rock bottom. What was the thing the The Fonz jumped?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A shark

questions.question: Desperate Housewives actress Teri Hatcher was a cast member of The Love Boat.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What did The Fonz do for a living according to the Happy Days sitcom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was a mechanic.

questions.question: Henry Winkler always wore a real leather jacket on camera while Happy Days was filming.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of the following cartoons was not created by Hanna-Barbera?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Popeye

questions.question: What was Captain Stubings first name on the hit television show The Love Boat ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Merrill

questions.question: The Happy Days character Fonz had his own cartoon.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What area of Als Diner did the Fonz refer to as my office in the hit sitcom Happy Days?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The mens room

questions.question: Which Hanna-Barbera cartoon featured a boy parachuting from a crashing plane and saved by a caveman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dino-Boy in the Lost Valley

questions.question: What was the name of the group of eight dancers on the hit television show The Love Boat?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Love Boat Mermaids

questions.question: Originally The Fonz from Happy Days was going to be called Mash.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What fixture of Als diner and eventually Arnolds did The Fonz like to hang around by in the Happy Days series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The jukebox

questions.question: A cast member from this show had a #1 Billboard Music single.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was the name of Major Nelsons best friend on the hit television show I Dream Of Jeannie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Major Roger Healey

questions.question: What is the name of this popular 70s TV show you will hear and extract from?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Six Million Dollar Man

questions.question: What is the name of this TV show that remained short-lived due to tragic circumstances?

questions.question: Episode 15 of season 1 of the TV series M*A*S*H was titled Tuttle. Hawkeye and Trapper made up the character of Captain Tuttle so that they could give supplies to the orphanage. They ended up giving all his back pay to the orphanage as well. What were Captain Tuttles first name and middle initial?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan S.

questions.question: In season 1 of I Dream Of Jeannie, Major Nelson was engaged to General Stones daughter. What was her first name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melissa

questions.question: The main character in this show whose theme you will hear lived and worked out of his ranch home.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: How old is Jeannie on the hit television show I Dream Of Jeannie ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2,000 years old

questions.question: What year did the show I Dream Of Jeannie first hit the airwaves?

questions.question: Name this popular comedy that began its 5-year run in 1978.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: WKRP in Cincinnati

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Jeannie and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, marcias. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On the hit television show I Dream Of Jeannie, Jeannie was not allowed to show what part of her body?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Navel

questions.question: Peter is being harassed by his football team for joining the glee club.  A professional football player shows up at practice and tells Peters teammates that he also used to be part of a glee club when he was younger.  Which famous football player appeared on The Brady Bunch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deacon Jones

questions.question: When was actor and singer Drake Bell born?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: June 27, 1986

questions.question: Marcia from The Brady Bunch is president of a fan club at school.  She  promises to get a certain famous singer to appear at the prom, but she doesnt even know how to get in touch with him. Who is this famous singer that Marcia wants to get to perform at her prom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Davy Jones

questions.question: Did Major Anthony Nelson and Jeannie ever get married on the hit television show  I Dream Of Jeannie ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What did Jeannie call Major Anthony Nelson on the popular sitcom I Dream Of Jeannie ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Master

questions.question: What  General replaced General Stone after the 1966 season of the famous television show I Dream Of Jeannie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: General Peterson

questions.question: In an episode of The Brady Bunch, Greg appears to be sick.  Alice discovers a love note he wrote to a mysterious girl named Linda.  Mike and Carol attempt to resolve the problem by trying to find out who Linda is.  Linda is actually Gregs math teacher.  She has a famous boyfriend who is a major league baseball player.  Who is the famous guest star in this episode?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wes Parker

questions.question: In a Brady Bunch episode, Bobby lies to his friends telling them that a certain professional football player is dropping by for dinner with the Bradys.  Bobbys friends are looking forward to meeting the NFL star because he is playing an exhibition game in town the next week.  Who was this famous guest star ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joe Namath

questions.question: What year did Nickelodeons Drake And Josh first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2004

questions.question: The Brady Bunch family is in Hawaii. The boys find a tiki idol and have to return it to a cave. When arriving at the cave, they get held hostage by an archaeologist who thinks that the Brady boys are up to no good. What famous person plays the part of the archaeologist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Vincent Price

questions.question: Drake And Josh is a spin-off of Nickelodeons The Amanda Show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What year did the hit television show I Dream Of Jeannie leave the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1970

questions.question: Marcias diary, in which she has confided her deep feelings for this famous person, is accidentally given away by her sister Cindy in an episode of The Brady Bunch.  She is so mad at Cindy she stops talking to her.  Mike and Carol begin searching the towns used book stores for the diary.  What famous person finds her diary and brings it to the Brady residence?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Desi Arnaz, Jr.

questions.question: What is the name of Drake Bells band in real life?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 24/7
